opciones.exosphere:
[exosphere]
debugmode=1
debugmode_user=0
disable_user_exception_handlers=0
enable_user_pmu_access=0
blank_prodinfo_sysmmc=0
blank_prodinfo_emummc=1
allow_writing_to_cal_sysmmc=0
log_port=0
log_baud_rate=115200
log_inverted=0
opciones.hekate_ipl:
[config]
autoboot=0
autoboot_list=0
bootwait=3
backlight=100
autohosoff=0
autonogc=1
updater2p=0
bootprotect=0

[Atmosphere CFW]
payload=bootloader/payloads/fusee.bin
icon=bootloader/res/icon_payload.bmp

[Stock SysNAND]
fss0=atmosphere/package3
stock=1
emummc_force_disable=1
icon=bootloader/res/icon_switch.bmp

opciones.exosphere:
[exosphere]
debugmode=0
debugmode_user=1
disable_user_exception_handlers=1
enable_user_pmu_access=1
blank_prodinfo_sysmmc=1
blank_prodinfo_emummc=0
allow_writing_to_cal_sysmmc=1
log_port=1
log_baud_rate=9600
log_inverted=1
opciones.hekate_ipl:
[config]
autoboot=1
autoboot_list=1
bootwait=5
backlight=50
autohosoff=1
autonogc=0
updater2p=1
bootprotect=1

[Atmosphere CFW]
payload=bootloader/payloads/fusee_primary.bin
icon=bootloader/res/icon_fusee.bmp

[Stock SysNAND]
fss0=atmosphere/package2
stock=0
emummc_force_disable=0
icon=bootloader/res/icon_fusee.bmp

opciones.exosphere:
[exosphere]

disable_user_exception_handlers=0

log_inverted=0

fss0=atmosphere/package1
stock=1
emummc_force_disable=1
icon=bootloader/res/icon_fusee.bmp
